content.en: Algorithmic industrial optimization: Researchers are exploring the potential of algorithms to improve various industrial processes. For example, algorithms are being used to develop automated inspection systems that can overcome the limitations of manual visual inspection in welding. Additionally, algorithms are being used to program robot-mounted optical scanning devices for measuring parts in high-variant assembly. These advancements have the potential to enhance the efficiency and accuracy of industrial processes.
content.da: Algoritmisk industriel optimering: Forskere udforsker algoritmers potentiale til at forbedre forskellige industrielle processer. For eksempel bliver algoritmer anvendt til at udvikle automatiserede inspektionssystemer, der kan overvinde begrænsningerne ved manuel visuel inspektion i svejsning. Derudover bliver algoritmer brugt til at programmere robotmonterede optiske scanningsenheder til måling af dele i samlinger med høj variation. Disse fremskridt har potentiale til at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af industrielle processer.
